key_risks: Competitive pressures from established and emerging players
Economic sensitivity tied to digital transformation spending
Data security and compliance risks, including past breaches
Stock volatility due to slowing growth and macroeconomic headwinds
Leadership changes and workforce reductions impacting morale and efficiency
controversies: Data breaches, including a 2024 phishing campaign and prior email compromise
CEO stock sale raising questions about insider confidence
Multiple rounds of layoffs (10% in 2022 and 6% in 2024)
social_issues: Workforce reductions raising concerns about employee welfare
Data breaches impacting customer trust and brand reputation
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance costs and risks in regulated industries
